meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Libya.
meanings.sent1: In Libya, you can buy many things with zaptiahs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for zaptiahs at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepted zaptiahs, no other currency!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of zaptiahs.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together filled the air as he counted his zaptiahs.

meanings.sent1: She collected different currencies, including zaptiahs.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling zaptiahs.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended to have a treasure chest full of zaptiahs.
meanings.sent4: The field was scattered with colorful zaptiahs, like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the jingle of zaptiahs as they were tossed into a jar.
